item.description:
Indian Head

Your group will do a loop hike starting from the Indian Head Trail and hike 1.8 gentle miles to the 2557' summit of Mt Pemigewasset and see stunning 180+ degree views of most of the mountains to the East.


On the easy side of moderate, this is a very easy hike of just 3.7 miles, only 1550' elevation gain and will take us about 3 hours or so.



Where:Indian Head Trail parking lot, North Woodstock , NH 03262

Meetup will continue after the hike at an area restaurant of your choice.

40% chance of rain during hike time frame cancels


We would like to see at least 3 "yes" RSVP's to create a meetup. This easy hike will need one of the hikers to take lead of the group. Your assistance on the trail is always welcome and helps in making a Meetup.

Please keep your rsvp's up to date. Its very important that we
have a true headcount, and not worry that your late or lost.

Every hiker is important on a hike, especially if we divide the
hike into a fast and slow group, or if there is an injury.


Your response/signing up for a hike certifies that you have read, understand, and agree with the NEHAAG disclaimer.

Make sure your hiker profile is complete so we can verify that your qualified to join us on this White Mountain hike.

Carpooling is always advised and a great way to get to know your fellow members.
item.how_to_find_us: This hike needs a leader. Meet in the parking lot, share cell phone #'s
item.name: Easy Mountain Hike: Indian Head Trail, North Woodstock , NH
